name: Alu Posto

ingredients.name: Green Chillie
ingredients.quantity: 8 nos - ground to a fine paste

steps: Heat oil in a frying pan and fry the potatoes till brown
Add salt and turmeric powder and blend it with the potatoes
Add poppy seed paste, green chillie paste and cook for 4 minutes stirring continuously
Add sugar and 2 cups of water and bring it to boil
Once boiling is reached, reduce flame and stirfry till the mixture attains a thick dry consistency
Your ALU POSTO is ready to be served
